data.title: Book Status
data.text: DraftYou’ve started entering book details, but haven’t submitted your book for publication. While in “Draft”, you can edit your details at any time. In Review Once you’ve submitted your book for publication it goes into review. During review, we check your book to make sure it meets our formatting and content guidelines. If your book was “In Review” and is back in “Draft”, it means we found some things that need to be updated – Check your email for more details from our team. Once you’ve updated your book to meet our guidelines, you can resubmit it for publication and we’ll review it again. While your book is “In Review”, you won’t be able to make changes. Reviews can’t be expedited or canceled. PublishingYour book has passed review and is being published. While your book is in “Publishing” you won’t be able to make changes. LiveYour book is published and available for purchase on Amazon. If needed, you can edit certain book details. For more information on which details can be edited after publishing, visit our Update Your Book Details page. Live - with unpublished changesYou edited the details of your “Live” book, but haven’t submitted your updates for publication. To submit your updates, follow the steps on our Update Your Book Details page. All updates must pass review before they’re “Live” on Amazon. Live - Updates in reviewYour book is available for purchase (“Live”), but the recent changes you made are being reviewed and are not yet published. The review process can’t be expedited or canceled. You also won’t be able to make any additional changes at this time. For information on when updates will be published, visit our Timelines page. Live - Updates publishingYour book is available for purchase (“Live”), but the recent changes you made are still being published and will be available on Amazon shortly. You won’t be able to make any additional changes until this process is complete. BlockedYour book doesn’t meet our content guidelines and is blocked from publishing or editing. Blocked titles can’t be deleted from your Bookshelf. If you have concerns about your blocked title, please contact us for more information. Pre-orderVisit our pre-order status page for a complete list of pre-order statuses. Release Date
